comments.body:
@CmdrNexus this is a bug that was fixed https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/commit/dbd09b0ffeca981c878c5ce5ec333019c85406a4

The basic issue is that the .NET and SkiaSharp streams work differently, and I was not properly handling this.
